meanings.definition: The middle part of a leg.
meanings.sent1: The midleg of the table was sturdy and strong.
meanings.sent2: She felt a cramp in her midleg after running for a long time.
meanings.sent3: The robot's midleg suddenly started dancing on its own!
meanings.sent4: The midleg of the journey was the most challenging part.
meanings.sent5: The midleg of the bridge provided support for the entire structure.

meanings.definition: To position something in the middle of a leg.
meanings.sent1: He carefully midlegged the bandage on his injured leg.
meanings.sent2: She needed to midleg the brace to ensure proper support.
meanings.sent3: The chef midlegged the garnish on the plate with precision.
meanings.sent4: She had to midleg her foot on the stool to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent5: The tailor had to midleg the hem of the pants for a perfect fit.
